transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Hi Nisha mam.
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: Vishal baat kar raha hu mai IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan ji sir boliye.
Executive: Mam aapko Shivangi ji ka call aaya tha?
Customer: Shivangi Shivangi ji ka call bhi aaya hai unhone mujhe kuch legal notice type ka kuch bheja hai unhone to usme mujhe karna kya hai ye ek baar mujhe thoda sa confirm kariye na.
Executive: Mai batata hu mai batata hu maine unse pucha tha actually wo keh rahe the ki buyer hame response nahi kar raha hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Haan response nahi kar raha because they are wrong unke liye.
Customer: Haan response nahi kar raha.
Executive: Yes mam. Jaise aapko response nahi kar raha waise hame bhi wo response nahi provide kar raha hai.
Customer: Aapko bhi nahi kar raha hai haan samajh gaya.
Executive: Yes mam. Then then humne kya kiya hai us ek to buyer ka jo number tha jo usko na blacklist kar diya mam. Theek hai and second apni side se jo hum solution kar rahe the humne aapko ek form diya hai mam kyuki meri unse baat hui thi to isme kya kar sakte hai mujhe Shivangi keh rahi thi ki madam se puchho agar unko legally proceed karna hai matlab agar legally koi action lena hai to unhone aapko na ek form bheja hai aap please wo submit kar dijiye mam taki wo further us process ko.
Customer: Mai wahi wahi to puch rahi hu mai wahi to aapse puch rahi hu jo form aapne mujhe diya hai na uska usko usko mai matlab usme kya usme jo hai mera company ka naam hoga aur wo jo hai uska company ka naam hoga right.
Executive: Haan matlab aap us us form ko open kariye mam usme meri khyal clarity provide ho jayegi ki kya kya karna hai agar fir bhi aapko doubt ho na to aap Shivangi ji ko call kar lijiyega mam theek hai aur kyuki maine unse pucha tha wo mujhe keh rahi thi ki waha par mam ka stamp lagega ki matlab aapki side se hamare paas request ye raise ho rahi hai ki ye process kariye.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: To matlab ek bari aap na Shivangi ji se baat kar lijiye kyuki mam maine kabhi ye handle nahi kiya wahi karte hai ye cheeze.
Customer: Mai Shivangi se baat kar lungi Shivangi madam se mai baat kar lungi theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Baki koi aur concern iske alawa?
Customer: Nahi aur koi concern to nahi hai filhal abhi pehle ye wala sort out ho jaye.
Executive: Theek hai mam. Mam baki Shivangi ji na aapse is cheez ke liye follow up le rahi hai mam theek hai aapka na hamare yaha par ek concern open hua tha jo aapne hame feedback diya to kya mai wo close kar sakta hu?
Customer: Abhi to ye wala kuch sort out hua nahi hai na pehle legal notice to dene dijiye unko.
Executive: Koi nahi aap apni side se ek bari form submit kar dijiye uske baad mai Shivangi ji se puch lunga kya process rehta hai mai aapko inform kar dunga fir aapko.
Customer: Haan mai form submit kar deti hu uske baad aap kar dijiyega theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai okay. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received a legal notice and needs clarification.

- Buyer not responding to the customer and IndiaMART.

- Wants to know details to fill in the form.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the purpose of the form.

- Buyer's number has been blacklisted.

- Advised to contact Shivangi for further assistance.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will submit the form.

- Executive will follow up with Shivangi.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- legal notice, form submission, buyer response, blacklist
